tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE meetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_name VARCHAR(255),
  meeting_date DATE,
  meeting_time TIME,
  agenda TEXT,
  organizer_name VARCHAR(255),
  participant_list TEXT,
  meeting_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_agendas (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agenda_title VARCHAR,
  meeting_date DATE,
  meeting_time TIME,
  organizer_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_notes (
  note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  participant_name VARCHAR,
  note_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meeting_agendas(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_agenda (
    id INT,
    meeting_date DATE,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_participants (
    id INT,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meeting_agenda(id)
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_notes (
    id INT,
    meeting_id INT,
    note_text TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meeting_agenda(id)
)

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participant_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participant_role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    meeting_id UUID REFERENCES meeting_agendas(agenda_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
